event.title: Keynote "Free Software in education – A glance at Europe" at DORS/CLUC in Zagreb, Croatia

body.p: On 18th of May, Guido Arnold, FSFE's edu-team coordinator, will give a key note titled: "Free Software in education – A glance at Europe" at DORS/CLUC in Zagreb, Croatia. The talk will discuss a few examples how Free Software is being used in Europe, how its use is politically backed, why the decision was made to migrate and which challenges were encountered.
